prompt: make me a pixel art of this image

structured_prompt.short_description: A pixel art image depicting two distinct anime-style characters, split down the middle. The left side features a character with light blue hair and a calm, slightly sad expression, with a lightning bolt symbol in their eye. The right side shows a character with spiky red hair and a fierce, intense expression, with a visible scar or stitching on their cheek and a drop of blood near their mouth. The image emphasizes a stark contrast between the two halves, representing opposing forces or personalities.

objects.description: The left half of an anime-style character's face, featuring light blue hair with subtle highlights and a calm, somewhat melancholic expression. A small lightning bolt symbol is visible within the pupil of the eye. The character's skin is pale white with light blue accents.
objects.relationship: One half of a split character, contrasting with the right half.
objects.shape_and_color: Irregular shapes of light blue hair and pale white face.
objects.appearance_details: Stylized anime features, prominent eye with a lightning bolt symbol.
objects.clothing: Dark collar visible at the bottom.
objects.skin_tone_and_texture: Pale white with light blue accents, smooth.

objects.description: The right half of an anime-style character's face, characterized by spiky red hair and an intense, fierce expression. A distinct scar or stitching mark is present on the cheek, and a small drop of blood is near the corner of the mouth. The character's skin is pale white with red accents.
objects.relationship: One half of a split character, contrasting with the left half.
objects.shape_and_color: Irregular shapes of spiky red hair and pale white face.
objects.appearance_details: Stylized anime features, sharp eye, scar/stitching on cheek, blood drop.
objects.clothing: Dark collar visible at the bottom.
objects.skin_tone_and_texture: Pale white with red accents, smooth.

lighting.shadows: Minimal, hard-edged shadows consistent with pixel art style.

aesthetics.composition: Symmetrical split composition, centered on the two character halves.

structured_prompt.context: This is a concept for a pixel art character portrait, possibly for a video game or digital avatar, showcasing a duality of personality or power.
